contentList.content: Spells you cast ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Force damage. In addition, when you deal Force damage with a spell, you cannot roll a [1].
Spells you cast ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage. In addition, when you deal Necrotic damage with a spell, you cannot roll a [1].
